text: Arau yisakale kaya, ‘ami nacharaa’, sihamtarao ami angikara grahana karaichilo; tara pichata sihamtaka yi upadesa diya haichila tarae ekansa sihamte paharai gaichila. Phalata ami sihamtara majata kiyamata paryanta sthayi satrauta arau bidbesa jagarauka karai raakhicho. Sihamte yi karaichila seya allahe acirae'i sihamtaka jana'i diba
